name: Rashe and the village of sacrifice
name_original: Rashe and the village of sacrifice
description:
■ Story
"Rashe" is a witch apprentice who has lost his way into a cursed village.
And the reticent boy "Shell" that I met by chance,
It's a black-and-white horror exploration game where you can explore here and there with two people, or you can make more and more lewd detours.
